Name: Infested SCV
Description:
Basic worker unit. Can gather resources, build Infested structures, and repair.

Can attack ground units.

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Root.Name: Hold Position

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Root.Name: Patrol

Root.Tooltip: Restores life to mechanical units and structures at the cost of resources.
Root.Name: Repair

Root.Tooltip: Orders SCV to gather resources from a selected Mineral Field or Vespene Geyser.
Root.Name: Gather

Root.Tooltip: Returns the carried resources to the nearest drop-off point.
Root.Name: Return Cargo

Root.Tooltip: Halts construction of this structure. The partial construction will remain.
Root.Name: Halt

Root.Tooltip: Orders the unit to apply your currently selected spray to the terrain at the target location.
Root.Name: Spray

TBl1.Tooltip:
Primary structure. Used to receive gathered resources. Grows creep used to feed nearby Zerg structures. Can use the Uproot ability.

Enables:
- Infested SCVs
- Overlords
TBl1.Name: Build Infested Command Center

TBl1.Tooltip: Built over a Vespene Geyser to allow harvesting of vespene gas.
TBl1.Name: Build Infested Refinery

TBl1.Tooltip:
Contains upgrades for Infested infantry and structures.

Enables:
- Infested Missile Turrets from Infested SCVs
TBl1.Name: Build Infested Engineering Bay

TBl1.Tooltip:
Defensive structure. Periodically spawns Infested infantry that fight from inside. Acts as a mobile ground transport while uprooted.

Bonus: +1 range to units inside.Enables:
- Infested Troopers
TBl1.Name: Build Infested Bunker

TBl1.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
TBl1.Name: Cancel

TBl1.Tooltip:
Anti-air defensive structure.

Can attack air units.
Detector
TBl1.Name: Build Infested Missile Turret

TBl1.Tooltip: This ability is locked by your Commander Prestige.
TBl1.Name: Build Infested Colonist Compound

TBl1.Tooltip:
Civilian residence. Periodically spawns Infested infantry.

Enables:
- Infested Civilians
TBl1.Name: Build Infested Colonist Compound

TBl2.Tooltip:
Air-unit production facility.

Enables:
- Infested Liberators
TBl2.Name: Build Infested Starport

TBl2.Tooltip: Contains upgrades for Infested Factory and Infested Starport units.
TBl2.Name: Build Infested Armory

TBl2.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
TBl2.Name: Cancel
